error.signature: An error occurred (AccessDenied) when calling the GetObject operation

verdict.summary: S3 access denied due to IAM policy, bucket policy, or ACL misconfiguration.

dead_ends.why_fails: Major security risk; exposes all objects to the internet
Against AWS security best practices; no audit trail

workarounds.action: Check IAM policy, bucket policy, and ACLs with aws iam simulate-principal-policy
workarounds.how: Identify which policy is denying access

workarounds.action: Add the required S3 permissions to the IAM role/user policy
workarounds.how: Add s3:GetObject, s3:PutObject, etc. for the specific bucket ARN

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'An error occurred (AccessDenied) when calling the GetObject operation' indicates an IAM permission denial, while 'An error occurred (ServiceUnavailableException) when calling the X operation' indicates an AWS service outage.
